sec.title: Ethics approval
sec.p: All studies were conducted in strict accordance with the institutional guidelines for animal research and approved by the Administration of Affairs Concerning Experimental Animals of the People’s Republic of China. All animal treatments were reviewed and approved in advance by the Ethics Committee of the Animal House facility of the Wuhan Institute of Virology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, (Wuhan, China) (protocol number: WIVA07201704; approval date September 1, 2016).

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

sec.title: Publisher’s Note
sec.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
